cs.CR, cs.GT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the incentives and allocation rules in proof-of-work blockchains, which are topics related to cryptography (cs.CR) and game theory (cs.GT). The paper also discusses desirable properties of allocation rules, which can be seen as a problem in distributed computing (cs.DC) and data structures (cs.DS). Finally, the paper uses axiomatic theory to analyze the allocation rules, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG).
